short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An app that tell you what you should be wearing today according to your local weather

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wondered which clothes you should wear today? Now there is an easy answer! 

The "What Should I Wear Today" extension will present you with the current weather and today's forecast (in Celsius) in your location, along with what you should wear according to your weather. 

For any issues and questions, please contact us at - reachus@lulugi.co

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the "What Should I Wear Today" Chrome extension and set Chromeâ„¢ New Tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your New Tab search services provided by Bing.
